Name: pork
Reason: Pork is explicitly forbidden in Islam (Quran 2:173)

Name: gelatin
Reason: Usually derived from pork unless specified as halal/beef gelatin

Name: lard
Reason: Pig fat - forbidden as pork derivative

Name: mono and diglycerides
Reason: May be derived from pork fat unless certified halal

Name: glycerin
Reason: May be derived from pork fat unless specified as vegetable glycerin

Name: l-cysteine
Reason: Often derived from pig hair or human hair

Name: vanilla extract
Reason: Contains alcohol unless specified as alcohol-free

Name: shortening
Reason: May contain lard unless specified as vegetable shortening
